title: Bug 4971: Unexpected behavior when using 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation on package viewer in project Ae, the package 'ui' gets copied. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' is copied to the destination package 'xxx'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new project named 'xxx'.
2. Open the package viewer.
3. Select a package in project Ae.
4. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
5. Paste the package in project 'xxx'.
